name: Irrigation Layer
description: Map irrigation infrastructure including heads, valves, and lines with toggle and edit capabilities.

prd.problemStatement: Understanding irrigation coverage requires visualizing heads, valves, and lines in relation to turf areas. Editable layers enable maintenance planning and troubleshooting.
userStories: As a superintendent, I want to map irrigation heads so that I can visualize coverage
As a superintendent, I want to toggle irrigation layers so that I can focus on specific infrastructure
